issue.title: Merge from 4.4.3 : For J3.6.x : Params -> fieldset description
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 



In joomla 3.6.x the fieldset description must be set or removed (not left empty).
Otherwise the bar is shoen empty, see :

gives that when string is empty :



**Fixed versions :** 4.3.6
